existing_features.title: Update ONLY the two selected text nodes in the Contact section (XPath: /html/body/div/div/main/section[6]/div/div/div/a[3]/div[2]/div[1] and /html/body/div/div/main/section[6]/div/div/div/a[3]/div[2]/div[2]) so that the first line (label) displays exactly "Projects" and the second line (value) displays exactly "Google Drive".

new_feature_requests.summary: Update UI labels: change one item to "Projects" and another item to "Google Drive"

projectName: Update Contact card labels to “Projects” and “Google Drive”
